daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit the famous Mughal Gardens and Shankaracharya Temple
Dining: Try traditional Kashmiri cuisine at a local restaurant
Shopping: Explore the local markets for handicrafts and souvenirs
Adventure Sports: Go white water rafting in the Lidder River
Hiking: Trek to the nearby hills for a breathtaking view of the valley
Nightlife: Enjoy a bonfire and music at a campsite
Museums: Visit the Sri Pratap Singh Museum to learn about the history and culture of Kashmir
Sightseeing: Take a shikara ride on Dal Lake and visit the floating gardens
Dining: Enjoy a sunset dinner cruise on the lake
Hiking: Trek to the glacier at Sonmarg
Adventure Sports: Try paragliding or skiing in Gulmarg
Shopping: Buy souvenirs and local handicrafts at the market in Srinagar

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Jammu Airport (IXJ) or Srinagar Airport (SXR), then take a taxi or bus to reach the desired destination in Jammu and Kashmir.
